scripts.postinstall: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/soroban/rpc" && npm run fund  && npm run deploy && npm run initialize && npm run bindings || { echo "Make sure you're running standalone RPC network on localhost:8000" && exit 1; }
scripts.fund:alice: ./soroban config identity generate alice && ./soroban config identity fund alice
scripts.fund: npm run fund:root && npm run fund:alice
scripts.bindings: npm run bindings:custom-types && npm run bindings:hello-world && npm run bindings:swap && npm run bindings:token
scripts.deploy:token: npm run install:token && npm run deploy:token:a && npm run deploy:token:b
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:custom-types && npm run deploy:hello-world && npm run deploy:swap && npm run deploy:token
scripts.initialize:token:a: ./soroban contract invoke --id $(cat contract-id-token-a.txt) --network standalone -- initialize --admin $(./soroban config identity address) --decimal 0 --name 'Token A' --symbol 'A'
scripts.initialize:token:b: ./soroban contract invoke --id $(cat contract-id-token-b.txt) --network standalone -- initialize --admin $(./soroban config identity address) --decimal 0 --name 'Token B' --symbol 'B'
scripts.initialize:tokens: npm run initialize:token:a && npm run initialize:token:b
scripts.mint:root:a: ./soroban contract invoke --id $(cat contract-id-token-a.txt) --network standalone -- mint --to $(./soroban config identity address) --amount 1000
scripts.mint:alice:b: ./soroban contract invoke --id $(cat contract-id-token-b.txt) --network standalone -- mint --to $(./soroban config identity address alice) --amount 1000
scripts.mint:tokens: npm run mint:root:a && npm run mint:alice:b
scripts.initialize: npm run deploy:token && npm run initialize:tokens && npm run mint:tokens
